attributes.action: Please set up a telephone scam  prevention police Task force
attributes.additional_details:
Nuisance and Silent phone calls, as well as Scam  Telephone calls are a growing problem  particularly for retired  and elderly people who may live alone.

Can the Government please consider taking stronger action to stop these disturbing and intrusive telephone calls.

If your children or relatives are living overseas these calls can cause much anxiety  and worry
